name: Julie
hero_1: Formerly in digital marketing, I retrained as a full-stack web developer and specialized in UI / UX design and implementation üë©üèª‚Äçüíª
hero_2: My goal is to provide the best user experience by being creative, spontaneous and taking initiatives üéØ

skills.description_1: I started my career in web marketing and community management, which allowed me to put my creativity to work and learn how to implement effective acquisition strategies and to create customer loyalty.
skills.description_2: I decided to reorient myself in web development to acquire the technique required to more concretely design the ideas that abound in my head.
skills.description_3: Curious and full of my various professional skills, I am a front-end developer with a particular appetite for UI/UX and always eager to progress in back-end. I like to create wireframes and develop attractive, efficient and intuitive websites.

experiences.description_1: Web developer specialized in UI/UX design, I previously worked in community management.
experiences.description_2: Of a spontaneous and versatile nature, I make a commitment to use my various skills.
experiences.description_3: I like to challenge the existing and imagine the future. üöÄ

jobs.kizeo_name: Web developer (Vue.Js & Laravel) - Specialized in front-end & UX/UI solutions
jobs.kizeo_description: Kizeo is a international SAS (simplified joint-stock company) created in France in 2011 and specialized in publishing software applications. In other words, our core business is to develop IT solutions for professionals in the form of mobile applications and softwares.
jobs.kizeo_duties_1: ‚Ä¢ Development of Kizeo web sites (Kizeo Forms & Kizeo Corp) in Vue.js and Laravel
jobs.kizeo_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Evaluate and improve existing UX/UI design of Kizeo solutions (Kizeo Forms, Kizeo Corp & Tempo by Kizeo)
jobs.kizeo_duties_3: ‚Ä¢ Design and implement new front-end UX/UI on Kizeo solutions
jobs.kizeo_duties_4: ‚Ä¢ Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and marketing department
jobs.kizeo_duties_5: ‚Ä¢ Maintenance of internal/external technical documentation (Notion, Kizeo Forms Documentation, Swagger API & Kizeo Forms Documentation)
jobs.kizeo_duties_6: ‚Ä¢ Participation in advanced internal/external support and in the development of new work processes on JIRA for support monitoring
jobs.kizeo_duties_7: ‚Ä¢ Participation in the execution and development of unit tests
jobs.simplelif_description: Simple Lif' is a start-up that develops a collaborative tool to facilitate the daily life of the nurses.
jobs.simplelif_duties_1: ‚Ä¢ Creation of some features for the Bonami app
jobs.simplelif_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Design and implementation of the back-office registration pages
jobs.office_duties_1: ‚Ä¢ Participation in the definition and implementation of the digital development strategy and its presence on social media and on the Web
jobs.office_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Animation and community management on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter in order to build loyalty, involve and federate the various targets for the promotion of the city
jobs.office_duties_3: ‚Ä¢ Creation and integration of contents (news, photos, videos) on the social medias, the website and the mobile app
jobs.office_duties_4: ‚Ä¢ Update the contents of the database of the tourist departmental platform (PATIO visitprovence)
jobs.office_duties_5: ‚Ä¢ Diffusion and promotion of a video campaign via AdWords (TrueView InStream)
jobs.office_duties_6: ‚Ä¢ Creation and diffusion of a weekly newsletter (Mailchimp)
jobs.office_duties_7: ‚Ä¢ Creation of flyers, logos and posters
jobs.office_duties_8: ‚Ä¢ English translation of tour guides and flyers
jobs.neko_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Creation of contents (logo, facebook cover, promotional visuals)
jobs.digitick_description: French leading on-line ticketing company, Digitick is part of Vivendi group.
jobs.digitick_duties_1: ‚Ä¢ Emailing : creation of weekly and monthly email marketing campaigns on Mailchimp; management of the workflow & email production calendar in collaboration with the commercial team; optimization of the email templates (HTML); improvement of the customers segmentation according to their tastes and previous purchases; creation of weekly reports and recommendations based on obtained results
jobs.digitick_duties_2: ‚Ä¢ Management and supervision of Pay Per Click advertising campaigns : SEM, affiliate, display and Facebook Ads campaigns
jobs.digitick_duties_3: ‚Ä¢ SEO : creation of meta contents for the (then) future version of Digitick.com
jobs.digitick_duties_4: ‚Ä¢ Affiliation: creation of partnerships and assistance in managing the communication schedule regarding the display campaigns
jobs.digitick_duties_5: ‚Ä¢ Google Analytics : supervision of the campaigns; creation of weekly and monthly reports about the results of the acquisition funnels of Digitick.com, zePass, Infoconcert and main white label websites

education.description_1: I obtained a bachelor's degree in a multidisciplinary program to improve my knowledge in economics, law and marketing while strengthening my language skills in english and starting to learn japanese.
education.description_2: Attracted by digital technology, I completed a master's degree in digital communication and, following certain professional experiences, I followed a training in web development.
